item.title: Post your bike! [BMX/Bikers Only]
item.dc:creator: @I_Pka_Kid_I I Pka Kid I
item.description:
@I_Pka_Kid_I wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:9, topic:428470”][quote author=I Pka Kid I link=topic=531162.msg3880161#msg3880161 date=1325977439]

[quote author=reyx7 link=topic=531162.msg3880134#msg3880134 date=1325976394]

I bet that can’t even carry a bag of rice…
[/quote]what the fuck?
It’s made for tricks/sport L0L

What’s the point of doing tricks on a bike?
[/quote]First of all, you aren’t sitting behind a screen all day (I am because I fucked my wrist up and cant handle the pressure on it when biking)
Secondly I stay very fit.
Third it’s fun as fuck. Just look at some videos on youtube.

  1. I don’t actually, I went out longboarding earlier w\ some friends
  2. I run XC and track, one of the best in the county
  3. Looks like suicide.[/quote]It is suicide, but it’s adrenaline, I love that feeling, that rush when I’m going hard doing shit. and when I land a new trick it’s like “now I’m better, woot.”

Read full topic

[/quote]
